property.name: AlternateBlockMaterial
property.summary: Gets or sets the alternate Material used when bashing or blocking with this Weapon.

property.name: AttackAnimation
property.summary: Gets or sets the attack animation of this Weapon.

property.name: AttackAnimationMultiplier
property.summary: Gets or sets the increase or decrease of the speed of the attack animations used by this Weapon.

property.name: AttackFailSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon misses or runs out of ammo.

property.name: AttackLoopSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound loop that plays when this Weapon is used.

property.name: AttackSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is used.

property.name: BlockImpactDataSet
property.summary: Gets or sets the Impact Data Set used when bashing or blocking with this Weapon.

property.name: CanCauseDismemberment
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon can cause a limb dismemberment.

property.name: CanCauseLimbExplosion
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon can cause a limb to explode.

property.name: CanDrop
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon can be put down.

property.name: CanUseInNormalCombat
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether NPCs can use this Weapon during normal combat.

property.name: CriticalDamage
property.summary: Gets or sets the additional damage caused by this Weapon on a critical hit.

property.name: CriticalEffect
property.summary: Gets or sets the critical effect e.i. Spell caused by this Weapon.

property.name: CriticalChanceMultiplier
property.summary: Gets or sets the critical chance multiplier of this Weapon.

property.name: Damage
property.summary: Gets or sets the damage caused by this Weapon.

property.name: Description
property.summary: Gets or sets the description of this Weapon that will override the enchantment description if provided.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: Enchantment
property.summary: Gets or sets the Enchantment of this Weapon.

property.name: EnchantmentCharge
property.summary: Gets or sets the charge of the enchantment of this Weapon.

property.name: EquipSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is equipped.

property.name: EquipType
property.summary: Gets or sets the Equip Type of this Weapon.

property.name: FirstPersonAttackSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is used in first person.

property.name: FirstPersonModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the Static object that will be shown when this Weapon is used in first person.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: FullName
property.summary: Gets or sets the in-game name of this Weapon.

property.name: IdleSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is idle.

property.name: ImpactDataSet
property.summary: Gets or sets the Impact Data Set used when attacking with this Weapon.

property.name: InventoryImage
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the inventory image (.dds file) that will be used for this Weapon.

property.name: IsAmmoUsed
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether NPCs need ammo while using this Weapon (bows only).

property.name: IsBackpackHidden
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon is hidden when sheathed.

property.name: IsBoundWeapon
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon has been conjured.

property.name: IsCriticalEffectTriggeredOnDeath
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the critical effect of this Weapon is always applied on death.

property.name: IsMinorCrime
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether attacking someone with this Weapon is considered a minor crime only (i.e. not an assault).

property.name: IsNonHostile
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether attacking someone with this Weapon does not cause the target become hostile.

property.name: IsPlayable
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon can be used by the player character.

property.name: IsPlayerOnly
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Weapon can be used and picked up by the player character only.

property.name: IsRangeFixed
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the AI is to ignore combat style multipliers for this Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Keywords associated with this Weapon.

property.name: MaxRange
property.summary: Gets or sets the maximal effective range of this Weapon.

property.name: MessageIcon
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the message icon (.dds file) that will be used for this Weapon.

property.name: MinRange
property.summary: Gets or sets the minimal effective range of this Weapon.

property.name: NumberOfProjectiles
property.summary: Gets or sets the number of projectiles launched when a single Ammo object is fired with this Weapon.

property.name: ObjectBounds
property.summary: Gets or sets the of this Weapon.

property.name: PickUpSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is picked up.

property.name: PutDownSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is put down.

property.name: Reach
property.summary: Gets or sets the reach of this Weapon.

property.name: Resistence
property.summary: Gets or sets the kind of resistence that can resist the damage caused by this Weapon.

property.name: Scripts
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Scripts attached to this Weapon.

property.name: Skill
property.summary: Gets or sets the Skill that will be used when this Weapon is wielded.

property.name: SoundLevel
property.summary: Gets or sets the sound level of this Weapon in regards to detection.

property.name: Speed
property.summary: Gets or sets the speed of this Weapon.

property.name: Stagger
property.summary: Gets or sets the amount of stagger applied on a hit by this Weapon.

property.name: TemplateWeapon
property.summary: Gets or sets the Weapon that will be used as the template.

property.name: Type
property.summary: Gets or sets the type of this Weapon.

property.name: UnequipSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Weapon is unequipped.

property.name: Value
property.summary: Gets or sets the value of this Weapon.

property.name: Weight
property.summary: Gets or sets the weight of this Weapon.

property.name: WorldModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the world model (.nif file) that will be used for this Weapon.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.
